title: Expert Training Course for BPPV Diagnosis and Treatment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of neurological symptoms
context.additional_context: Offline classroom instruction for medical professionals to systematically acquire diagnostic and treatment techniques for BPPV, including supplementary digital learning materials and practical assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the etiology, symptoms, and diagnostic criteria of BPPV with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform the Dix-Hallpike test (DH test) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can perform the canalith repositioning maneuver (CRM) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can develop a treatment plan based on BPPV patient management scenarios and execute it with over 80% proficiency.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
